original_text: On the second day the heads of fathers' houses of all the people, with the priests and the Levites, came together to Ezra the scribe in order to study the words of the Law.
korean_text: 그 이튿날 뭇 백성의 족장들과 제사장들과 레위 사람들이 율법의 말씀을 밝히 알고자 하여 학사 에스라에게 모여서

sentences.original_text: the heads of fathers' houses of all the people
with the priests and the Levites
came together to Ezra the scribe
in order to study the words of the Law.
